p:
Oropharyngeal swabs were collected from 7479 healthy volunteers (1–29-years-old), as described by Bårnes et al. [ 21]. Sampling took place in a 6 month period in 2014 in the district of Arba Minch (South Ethiopia) in four kebeles (the smallest administrative unit within a district): Genta Mechie, Zigiti Mechie, Gatse and Kolla Shelle. The 492 isolates putatively confirmed as
N. meningitidis
at the Norwegian Institute of Public Health were included in this analysis.
